snippet: The Mets continue to shed ineffective players while moving slowly in negotiations with the star pitcher R. A. Dickey, who also could be traded.
abstract: New York Mets continue to shed ineffective players while moving slowly in negotiations with pitcher R A Dickey, who also could be traded; latest player to depart is outfielder Andres Torres, who signed a one-year deal with San Francisco Giants.
lead_paragraph: The Mets continue to shed ineffective players while moving slowly in negotiations with the star pitcher R. A. Dickey, who also could be traded.

headline.seo: As Mets Sit Quietly, Trade Speculation Swirls
headline.main: As the Mets Sit Quietly, Trade Speculation Swirls
headline.print_headline: As the Mets Sit Quietly, Trade Speculation Swirls
